name: Loaded French Fries
description: Home style fried covered in melted cheese, bacon, secret sauce, and topped with green onions.

name: Hummus Platter
description: A bowl of hummus served with freshly made tortilla chips.

name: Cheese Burger
description: 1/4lb angus beef patty, lettuce, tomatoe, onion, and cheddar cheese on a brioche bun. Served with our homestyle french fries.

name: Crab Rangoon Penne
description: Penne pasta in a creamy sauce with crab, spinach, and topped with parmesean cheese.

name: Steak
description: Tri-tip steak cooked to your liking, served with roasted vegetables.

name: Roast Beef on Rye
description: Roast beefs sandwhich with lettuce, shredded carrots, provalone cheese, and bacon jam, all on our made in house rye bread.

name: Side Salad
description: Fresh salad greens toppend with tomatos, your choice of protein, and your choice of dressing.

name: Homestyle French Fries
description: Fresh cut french fries served with your choice of dipping sauces.

name: Citrus Surprise
description: Orange lemon thyme and cranberry infused

name: Orange Spiced Cider
description: Orange spiced cider with hints of cinnamon, clove, and anise.

name: Ice Cream Parfait
description: Layers of strawberries and our homemade vanilla bean ice cream.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Chocolate cake layered with chocolate mousse and topped with rasberry compote.
